allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add GMGN integration, FlareSolverr bypass, and PumpSwap support

- Add GMGN service for smart money tracking and trending tokens
- Add FlareSolverr service to bypass Cloudflare protection
- Update PumpFun monitor with PumpSwap graduation support \(March 2025+\)
- Add data aggregator service for multi-source token data
- Enhance DexScreener with boosted tokens and token profiles
- Add discovery commands to Telegram bot \(/trending, /smartmoney\)
- Extend risk classifier with GMGN smart money signals
- Add new types for GMGN tokens, smart money activity, trending tokens
- Add API tests and unit tests for new services

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add GMGN web scraping fallback for Cloudflare bypass

- Add gmgnScraper.ts: scrapes GMGN webpage via FlareSolverr when API is blocked
- Update gmgn.ts: adds scraping as 3rd fallback \(Direct -> FlareSolverr API -> Scraping\)
- Extracts token symbol, name, market cap, volume, and TX count from rendered HTML
- Successfully bypasses Cloudflare protection on GMGN

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 18 comprehensive filter profiles with enhanced settings

Filter Profile Categories:
- Risk-based: sniper, early, balanced, conservative, graduation, whale, degen, cto
- Market Cap: micro \($1K-$50K\), small \($50K-$500K\), mid \($500K-$5M\), large \($5M-$50M\), mega \($50M+\)
- Strategy: trending \(3x volume spike\), momentum \(50%+ up\), fresh \(<5min\), revival \(down 80%+\), runner \(100%+ today\)

New FilterSettings fields:
- maxLiquidity, maxTokenAge, maxSingleHolderPercent
- minMcap, maxMcap for market cap filtering
- minBondingCurve, maxBondingCurve for Pump.fun graduation tracking
- volumeSpikeMultiplier, minPriceChange1h, minVolume24h for momentum
- fastMode for instant alerts
- lpBurnedMinPercent for safety requirements

Updated Telegram commands:
- /filter now shows all 18 profiles by category
- /set supports new parameters: maxliq, maxsingle, maxage, minmcap, maxmcap, minvol, volspike, minbond, maxbond
- Enhanced /settings display with all new filters

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "powercfg /change standby-timeout-ac 0; powercfg /change standby-timeout-dc 0; powercfg /change monitor-timeout-ac 0; powercfg /change monitor-timeout-dc 0; echo ''Sleep mode disabled''")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add alert categories, quiet hours, and token blacklist features

- Alert categories: Toggle individual alert types \(new tokens, volume
  spikes, whale moves, liquidity drains, authority changes, price alerts,
  smart money\) via /alerts command with interactive UI
- Quiet hours: Set time ranges when alerts are paused with presets
  \(night, sleep, work, evening\) via /quiet command
- Token blacklist: Block specific tokens or creator wallets from ever
  triggering alerts via /bl command with labels and reasons
- All three features integrated into new token alerts, advanced monitor
  alerts \(volume/whale/liquidity\), and watchlist price alerts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add alert priority levels feature

- Four priority levels: critical, high, normal, low
- Default priorities assigned to each alert category:
  - Critical: liquidity drains, authority changes
  - High: whale moves, smart money
  - Normal: new tokens, volume spikes, price alerts
- /priority command with interactive UI to set minimum threshold
- Sound toggle option for notifications
- Priority check integrated into all alert paths \(new tokens,
  advanced monitor, watchlist price alerts\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
